name: Deep Water Lurkers (LDJAM 48)
description:
Entry for LDJAM48.  Collect iron to build a bigger oxygen tank, allowing you to dive deeper and discover new, bizzare species. Don't let your oxygen run out.

Controls:

Move: WASD/Arrows

Interact: Spacebar

E: Show/hide species list

Esc: Pause

Numpad+/-: Zoom camera

Thanks to Miles (age 7) and Ren (dad) for their designs.

Changelog:

0.1.3 Fixed a bug where scanned species do not count towards discovery progress after a game over.  Added camera zoom.
